factText: another reason to stay at home - tornadoes crossing our interstate
So far this year, there have been 67 #tornado deaths in the US.
Therefore, we have CANCELLED the Severe Thunderstorm Watch for all remaining counties.
Weather permitting, Route 61/Kingshighway will be closed at I-55 while contractor crews demolish the southbound I-55 bridge overnight.
The southbound on ramp and northbound off ramp will remain open during these hours.
Make sure you know what to do in case of severe weather, have a plan and be prepared. Be prepared for severe #weather.

An EF-0 tornado with estimated peak winds of 80 mph touched down in Homosassa (Citrus County, FL) Monday morning. NWS surveyors have concluded that an EF0 #tornado touched down in #Pace #Florida early Monday morning.
No, but everyone should be aware of the situation and be prepared to seek shelter if necessary. Stay safe and call 911
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-017_general_Are evacuation orders still in place or have they been lifted?

factText:
A TORNADO WARNING is in effect until 3 pm for Southern Westchester, The Bronx, Manhattan and NW Nassau. #TORNADO #WARNING in effect for WESTCHESTER, BRONX, MANHATTAN, NASSAU until 3PM
https://t.co/QDRAQD5mNG. A tornado warning has been issued for portion of New York City, in New York, as well as its adjacent suburbs. #Tornado warning issued in #NYC today!. Work will begin this week on upgrading Metro's tornado sirens. #Tornado #Warning right now https://t.co/xJiT3n4Vs7

It looks like Thursday will especially be another active #severe weather and #tornado day. Damaging winds and/or large hail are expected. #NOAA #Radio #Weather #Alert Lower New York and parts of NJ: Heavy Thunderstorm AND Tornado just issued. Tornado warning in Manhattan. It means conditions will be favorable for the development of severe storms capable of large hail, damaging winds and a few tornadoes.

Looks like the final #tornado tally from the April 12-13 outbreak will be around 132 tornadoes. As storms head east into #MS, #AL, #GA, and North #FL, conditions for #tornado development become more favorable. 132 Tornadoes recorded during the Easter Sunday outbreak last week. #Tornado #134 from the Easter Outbreak has been confirmed. 35 "strong" tornadoes. A compilation map of confirmed tornadoes across the southeast from the Easter Sunday/Monday outbreak.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-017_Tornado_Are meteorologists predicting more tornadoes following {event}?

factText: Of the 346 people hospitalized for a positive case or for investigation, 164 are in ICU, leaving 36% of the state’s current ICU beds available. The Choctaw Nation location is in McAlester, with more information available at choctawnation.com/news-events/press-media/choctaw-nation-offers-covid-19-testing-public:=:https://www.choctawnation.com/news/biskinik/⁠ ·· The Cherokee Nation is providing disaster FOOD services to households in need of assistance.⁠ ·
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-017_general_What medical services are available for affected individuals?

factText: #Emergency removal of a large, snapped pine tree in #Chattanooga, #Tennessee.

The SPC has just upgraded portions of      #texas , #Oklahoma , #Arkansas , and #Louisiana to enhanced risk. Considered Northern Illinois’ Worst Tornado Disaster. Severe #WEATHER expected Northeast, new storm to hit South https://t.co/8whBU9NqGw

STRONG ROTATION ENDED UP OCCURRING JUST EAST OF WHERE I AM LOCATED, & THERE WAS A #CONFIRMED #WATERSPOUT OVER #LONGISLANDSOUND. #floods #weather Flash floods swamp New Caledonia after nearly 8 inches of rain in 6 hours https://t.co/yqTcxnUSrs. Multiple waterspouts were spotted near Asbury Park, New Jersey moments ago!

#TORNADO ON THE GROUND #BRIDGEPORT #POWERFLASHES AND DEBRIS NOW https://t.co/gJjPAy46DS. Thunderstorm  [ foxnews]  #Tornado reported in Florida as severe weather brings downed trees, power lines to area https://t.co/rGhZgB5TRS

⚠⚡A #SevereThunderstorm #Watch (#2 today) has been issued for portions of: (#Oklahoma Panhandle and north #Texas Panhandle), which is in effect until 10:00PM CDT. ⚠⚡A #SevereThunderstorm #Watch (#3 today) has been issued for portions of western & central #Oklahoma, which is in effect until 2:00AM CDT Wed, 04/22.
Damage surveys today found the trees down in the Deland area to be that of straight-line winds of 55-65 mph.

factText: Disaster relief, providing food, water and shelter.

factText:
A #Tornado WARNING now in-effect for parts of the Bronx and Westchester County. 

. 132 tornadoes in 10 states. Another strong and deadly long tracked #tornado in southern #Mississippi last night. Yesterday a tornado passed through the Homosassa area, as previously reported. Another MASSIVE #tornado rips through Mississippi. #TuesdayThoughts #tuesdayvibes #TuesdayMotivation #TORNADOWARNING #Tornado

⚠⚡🌪#SevereWeather/#Tornado #Outbreak AGAIN Probable from Wednesday through Thursday: Beginning in Texas/Oklahoma/Arkansas/Louisiana/Mississippi Wednesday as seen in Map 1, continuing eastward into Alabama/Georgia/Florida/Carolinas on Thursday as seen in Map 2. ⚠Tornadoes, Damaging Wind Gusts, & Large Hail all Expected. This will cause additional clusters of strong to severe thunderstorms to occur throughout eastern Texas, Oklahoma, Arkansas, and Louisiana.

#Tornado and Storm Relief Resources https://t.co/0meBPYkIsK https://t.co/27sP3sdnKR. Good job we are already sheltering in place #tornado #newyork https://t.co/gLFRY6F65E. Although there is no completely safe place during a #tornado, some locations are much safer than others. Please continue to be safe 😁 #HomeRateHelps #chattanooga #disaster #tornado #disasterrelief #firstresponders #community. #Hurricane safety tips and resourceshttps://bit.ly/2Kinhuv
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-017_Tornado_What emergency shelters are open specifically for tornado victims?

factText:
.@WellsFargo is donating $100,000 to @RedCross for #tornado and #flood relief across the southern U.S . We are providing food, water and shelter.
. Thank you to Firehouse Subs for working on such short notice to get our donation of food ready to the first responders who needed our support 🙏🏽 thank you to The Salvation Army USA for helping coordinate 🙏🏽

A #Tornado Warning is issued for the areas of #Yonkers #NewRochelle #Bronx #PortWashington #GlenCove.  . #WEATHER ALERT: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued for entire region until 3 p.m. https://t.co/dHomsRh3d0. #Tornado Warning [!] issued for #Manhattan & The #Bronx: 2:30 PM to 3:00 PM today, 4/21. #Breaking #Tornado Warning issued for the following areas.  . [nypost] #Tornado Warning issued for Manhattan, The Bronx amid fierce thunderstorm https://t.co/mz3uLpS8BZ

Regions hit by last week's #tornadoes are seeing #recovery proceed, but at a slower pace than normal. Be careful Texas Panhandle it can get rowdy today into tonight with storms possible #Tornados as well. April 21: For those in the #Texas and #Oklahoma Panhandles, have a plan in case #SevereWeather threatens.
